Title: I used this 240Hz OLED gaming monitor, and it offers unbeatable value — you even get an LG WOLED panel
Description:
KTC's G27P6S is a 240Hz OLED gaming monitor with a difference.
It uses the same LG WOLED panel as most monitors in this category, but coming in at just $499, it is an unbeatable value.

Title: Earth was born dry until a cosmic collision made it a blue planet
Description:

Initially, the planet was barren and inhospitable, missing water and carbon compounds.

Title: Black hole discovery confirms Einstein and Hawking were right
Description:
A fresh black hole merger detection has offered the clearest evidence yet for Einstein’s relativity and Hawking’s predictions.
Scientists tracked the complete cosmic collision, confirming that black holes are defined by mass and spin.
